div.p: Claim it now for free on Steam.

ul.li: Ratings: Metacritic 66 % / Steam 81 % (9/10, 569 recommendations) / IGDB Meta 70 % (9 sources) / IGDB User 67 % (59 sources)

Description: Dark Sector thrusts players into the role of Hayden Tenno, a covert operative sent on a dangerous mission into Lasria, an Eastern European city on the brink of ruin that hides a deadly Cold War secret. In the midst of this mission, Hayden is attacked by an unknown enemy and infected by the Technocyte Virus, a brutal bio-weapon that twists its victims into mindless killing machines. Surviving this attack, Hayden finds that the Technocyte virus has granted him powerful, inhuman abilities unlike anything he has ever seen. Now, he must evolve with his powers, survive and become a hero.

div.p: * Any information about the offer is automatically grabbed and may in rare cases not match the correct game.
